scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Conversations_Title}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
#set($accessingUser = $core_v2_user.Accessing) #if(!$core_v2_user.IsRegistered($accessingUser.Id)) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end $!core_v2_page.RedirectToHashedQuery()
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('new-conversation')
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('delete-conversation') $core_v2_language.GetResource('view-all-conversations')
$core_v2_language.GetResource('conversation-list-none')
$core_v2_language.GetResource('conversation-none')
$core_v2_language.GetResource('shortcut-alt-right') $core_v2_language.GetResource('shortcut-next-conversation')
$core_v2_language.GetResource('shortcut-alt-left') $core_v2_language.GetResource('shortcut-previous-conversation')
$core_v2_language.GetResource('shortcut-alt-up') $core_v2_language.GetResource('shortcut-scroll-up')
$core_v2_language.GetResource('shortcut-alt-down') $core_v2_language.GetResource('shortcut-scroll-down')
$core_v2_language.GetResource('shortcut-alt-a') $core_v2_language.GetResource('shortcut-new-conversation')
$core_v2_language.GetResource('shortcut-alt-d') $core_v2_language.GetResource('shortcut-leave-conversation')
$core_v2_language.GetResource('shortcut-alt-f') $core_v2_language.GetResource('shortcut-search')
$core_v2_language.GetResource('conversation-new')
$core_v2_submittableEditor.Render('editor', 'function() { jQuery.telligent.evolution.widgets.conversations.submit(); }', "%{ContentTypeId = $core_v2_conversationMessage.ContentTypeId.ToString(), EnterToSubmitPrompt = $core_v2_language.GetResource('editor_entertosubmit'), Height = '125px', SubmitLabel = $core_v2_language.GetResource('editor_submit'), Width = '100%'}")
#registerClientTemplate($core_v2_widget.UniqueId('templateConversation')) $core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('template-conversation.vm') #end #registerClientTemplate($core_v2_widget.UniqueId('templateParticpant')) $core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('template-participant.vm') #end #registerClientTemplate($core_v2_widget.UniqueId('templateConversationMessage')) $core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('template-conversation-message.vm') #end #registerClientTemplate($core_v2_widget.UniqueId('templateConversationMessageHeader')) $core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('template-messageheader.vm') #end #registerClientTemplate($core_v2_widget.UniqueId('templateConversationStatusHeader')) $core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('template-statusheader.vm') #end #registerEndOfPageHtml('telligent.evolution.widgets.conversations') #end #registerEndOfPageHtml() #end

language.resource: Are you sure you want to hide this conversation? It will reappear if anyone sends a new message.
Are you sure you want to delete this message?
Start your conversation by sending the first message below.
Select a message or start a new one.
Please add a message. Blank messages are not allowed.
You are not allowed to send a message to '{0}'.
Please add one or more recipients for your message.
